UK coronavirus cases are down by a third in a week after new 12,330 infections were recorded in the past 24 hours.
A further 205 people have died from Covid-19 a slight decrease from yesterday's tal… [+1959 chars]

articles.author: Jonathan Chadwick
articles.title: Blood test could predict Alzheimer's disease 4 years before symptoms - Daily Mail
articles.description: Two molecules found in blood could predict how likely people are to get Alzheimer's disease later in life, a new 'game-changing' study shows.
articles.content:
A blood test to detect two molecules that act as indicators of a person's likelihood to get Alzheimer's disease later in life could be a 'game-changer', a new study claims. 
The two molecules P-tau1… [+7918 chars]
